attribution: Provided by the Library of Congress
description: Also shows block numbers. At head of title: No. II. Includes directory of "Width of streets and avenues." "D C 53 3." LC copy halved and mounted on cloth backing. LC lacks other sheets in set. Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image. DCP
label: Map of the city of Washington showing location of fatal cases of zymotic diseases for the year ending June 30, 1894
